      • isVoid

        public static boolean isVoid(java.lang.Object obj)
        This method will test if the object passed to it is null and return a boolean.
        Parameters:
        obj - Object to be tested for void
        Returns:
        boolean true if object is void else false.

      • isVoid

        public static boolean isVoid(java.lang.String str)
        This method will test if the string passed to it is null or empty and return a boolean.
        Parameters:
        str - Object to be tested for void
        Returns:
        boolean true if string is null else false

      • equals

        public static boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj1,
                             java.lang.Object obj2)
        Utility to check if 2 objects are equal. This utility takes care of null and void conditions.
        Parameters:
        obj1 - First object for equals check.
        obj2 - Second object for equals check.
        Returns:
        true if both objects are equal or null.
        See Also:
        isVoid(Object)
